titles: A true reporte or description of an horrible, wofull, and moste lamentable murther doen in the citie of Bristowe by one Ihon Kynnestar, a sherman by his occupation, declaryng howe wickedly he murthered his owne wife, in the monethe of August laste paste, and beyng taken, was ha[n]ged the same moneth 1572 and now newly set forth in print the .xxv. daie of the monethe of Ianuary. 1573.
author: D. S., fl. 1573.
Sterrie, D.
Smith, Jude.
notes: A ballad, signed D.S., i.e. D. Sterrie?.
Includes "An admonmishment of the same" [in verse], signed Iude Smith.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Kynnestar, John, d. 1572 --  Early works to 1800.
